an5.194:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
an5.194:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena kāraṇapālī brāhmaṇo licchavīnaṃ kammantaṃ kāreti.
an5.194:1.3: Addasā kho kāraṇapālī brāhmaṇo piṅgiyāniṃ brāhmaṇaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ;
an5.194:2.1: “Handa kuto nu bhavaṃ piṅgiyānī āgacchati divā divassā”ti?
an5.194:2.3: “Taṃ kiṃ maññati bhavaṃ piṅgiyānī samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ? Paṇḍito maññe”ti?
an5.194:2.4: “Ko cāhaṃ, bho, ko ca samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jānissāmi.
an5.194:2.5: Sopi nūnassa tādisova yo samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jāneyyā”ti.
an5.194:2.6: “Uḷārāya khalu bhavaṃ piṅgiyānī samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pasaṃsāya pasaṃsatī”ti.
an5.194:2.7: “Ko cāhaṃ, bho, ko ca samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pasaṃsissāmi.
an5.194:2.8: Pasatthappasatthova so bhavaṃ gotamo seṭṭho devamanussānan”ti.
an5.194:2.9: “Kiṃ pana bhavaṃ piṅgiyānī atthavasaṃ sampassamāno samaṇe gotame evaṃ abhippasanno”ti?
an5.194:3.1: “Seyyathāpi, bho, puriso aggarasaparititto na aññesaṃ hīnānaṃ rasānaṃ piheti;
an5.194:3.2: evamevaṃ kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammaṃ suṇāti—
an5.194:3.3: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyākaraṇaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5.194:3.4: tato tato na aññesaṃ puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇappavādānaṃ piheti.
an5.194:4.1: Seyyathāpi, bho, puriso jighacchādubbalyapareto madhupiṇḍikaṃ adhigaccheyya.
an5.194:4.2: So yato yato sāyetha, labhateva sādurasaṃ asecanakaṃ;
an5.194:4.3: evamevaṃ kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammaṃ suṇāti—
an5.194:4.4: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyākaraṇaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5.194:4.5: tato tato labhateva attamanataṃ, labhati cetaso pasādaṃ.
an5.194:5.4: yadi mūlato, yadi majjhato, yadi aggato—
an5.194:5.6: evamevaṃ kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammaṃ suṇāti—
an5.194:5.7: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyākaraṇaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5.194:5.8: tato tato adhigacchati pāmojjaṃ adhigacchati somanassaṃ.
an5.194:6.1: Seyyathāpi, bho, puriso ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
an5.194:6.2: Tassa kusalo bhisakko ṭhānaso ābādhaṃ nīhareyya;
an5.194:6.3: evamevaṃ kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammaṃ suṇāti—
an5.194:6.4: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyākaraṇaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5.194:7.1: Seyyathāpi, bho, pokkharaṇī acchodakā sātodakā sītodakā setakā supatitthā ramaṇīyā.
an5.194:7.2: Atha puriso āgaccheyya ghammābhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipāsito.
an5.194:7.3: So taṃ pokkharaṇiṃ ogāhetvā nhātvā ca pivitvā ca sabbadarathakilamathapariḷāhaṃ paṭippassambheyya.
an5.194:7.4: Evamevaṃ kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammaṃ suṇāti—
an5.194:7.5: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyākaraṇaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5.194:8.1: Evaṃ vutte, kāraṇapālī brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā dakkhiṇaṃ jāṇumaṇḍalaṃ pathaviyaṃ nihantvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā tikkhattuṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
an5.194:12.1: Abhikkantaṃ, bho piṅgiyāni, abhikkantaṃ, bho piṅgiyāni.
an5.194:12.2: Seyyathāpi, bho piṅgiyāni, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya: ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti; evamevaṃ bhotā piṅgiyāninā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
an5.194:12.3: Esāhaṃ, bho piṅgiyāni, taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṃghañca.
an5.194:12.4: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ piṅgiyānī dhāretu, ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
